statements: SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, network_traffic, data_timestamp FROM IoT_Sensor_Data;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, data_timestamp, network_traffic FROM IoT_Sensor_Data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, network_traffic FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE network_traffic > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, network_traffic FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE network_traffic > 1000 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Temperature%' AND network_traffic < 500 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_timestamp FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(network_traffic) AS average_traffic, MIN(network_traffic) AS min_traffic, MAX(network_traffic) AS max_traffic FROM IoT_Sensor_Data;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, traffic_data FROM network_traffic_data LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensor_metadata
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, timestamp, traffic_data FROM network_traffic_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM network_traffic_data JOIN sensor_metadata ON network_traffic_data.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE sensor_location = 'Building A' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%Floor%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, install_location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE last_calibration < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp, JSON_EXTRACT(traffic_data, '$.traffic_volume') AS traffic_volume FROM network_traffic_data WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(traffic_data, JSON_OBJECT('sensor_status', 'active')) ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_location = 'New York'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Camera'
SELECT sensor_id,sensor_type,traffic_data FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Laser'
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC
SELECT data_id,data_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 101
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, traffic_data FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Camera' ORDER BY sensor_location DESC
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.sensor_location, d.data_timestamp, d.data_value FROM NetworkTrafficSensors s JOIN SensorData d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id ORDER BY d.data_timestamp DESC
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.sensor_location, st.status_code, st.status_message FROM NetworkTrafficSensors s JOIN SensorStatus st ON s.sensor_id = st.sensor_id WHERE st.status_code = 1

SELECT s.sensor_location, d.data_timestamp, st.status_message FROM NetworkTrafficSensors s JOIN SensorData d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id JOIN SensorStatus st ON s.sensor_id = st.sensor_id WHERE d.data_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_sensors LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM network_traffic_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, avg_value, min_value, max_value FROM sensor_aggregated_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, error_message FROM sensor_errors WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature'
SELECT id, sensor_id, location FROM network_traffic_sensors ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM network_traffic_sensors WHERE location = 'office' AND sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT sensor_id, avg_value, max_value FROM sensor_aggregated_data WHERE avg_value > 50 AND max_value < 100
SELECT sensor_id, error_message, timestamp FROM sensor_errors WHERE sensor_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, data_value FROM network_traffic_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM network_traffic_sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, data_value FROM network_traffic_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT source_ip, dest_ip, protocol, data_size FROM traffic_analysis WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, alert_type FROM alert_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
